
	/* -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
	/* --- MATERIAL CSS ---------------------------------------------------------------- */
	/* -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
	/* --- Light CSS framework for creating a Material Design look&feel ----------- */
	/* --- aplicable to webapps. Supports any JS framework ------------------------ */
	/* -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
	/* --- Developed by:				------------------------------------------------------ */
	/* ---   Rafael Pérez García		------------------------------------------------------ */
	/* ---   at ImperdibleSoft		------------------------------------------------------ */
	/* -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
	/* --- http://www.imperdiblesoft.com		----------------------------------------- */
	/* --- https://github.com/ImperdibleSoft/material-css		---------------------- */
	/* -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

v0.3.3
	+Added: Image on header supported when body has "Front" layout.
	+Added: Invisible inputs
	+Fixed: Animations
	
	
v0.3.2
	+ Added: Autocomplete menu.
	+ Added: New icons (details, animal).
	+ Added: New themes (MyPetcard).
	+ Added: Disabled form elements.
	+ Added: New layouts (hidden-nav, no-nav).
	+ Added: Tables
	+ Removed: Stadistics ajax call.
	+ Fixed: mc-input width.
	+ Fixed: mc-tab sizes.
	+ Fixed: Navigation panel behaivour.
	+ Fixed: Grid layout.
	+ Fixed: Tabs bar on Tablets.
	
v0.3.1
	+ Added: Splash screen.
	+ Fixed: Application gets disabled when Navigation bar is opened on Mobile versions.
	+ Fixed: MC Javascript functions.
	
v0.3
	+ Fixed: Share layout.
	
v0.2.0222
	+ Added: Share layout.
	+ Fixed: Chat layout.
	+ Fixed: Multimedia Theme.
	
v0.2.0220
	+ Added: Multimedia layout.
	+ Fixed: Chat layout.
	+ Fixed: Spotify Theme.
	
v0.2.0219
	+ Added: Chat layout.
	+ Fixed: Header account info menu.
	+ Fixed: Floating windows.
	
v0.2.0218
	+ Added: New icons (forums, notifications, external, play, pause, stop, music-next, music-prev, playilst, volume-up, volume-down, volume-off, facebook, google-plus, twitter, skype, imperdiblesoft, github, soundcloud, youtube, instagram, linkedin).
	+ Added: New colors (spotify).
	+ Added: Header account info menu.
	+ Added: Floating windows.
	+ Added: Spotify Theme.
	+ Fixed: Dropdowns. Now a blocker is displayed on background.
	+ Fixed: Default Theme.
	+ Fixed: Android Theme.
	+ Fixed: ImperdibleSoft Theme.
	+ Fixed: Google+ Theme.
	+ Fixed: Facebook Theme.
	+ Fixed: Twitter Theme.
	
v0.2.0213
	+ Added: Footer.
	+ Fixed: Minor fixes.
	
v0.2.0212
	+ Fixed: Tabs bar scrolling delay.
	+ Fixed: Slider scroll delay.
	
v0.2 / v0.2.0210
	+ Fixed: Colors on default framework style.

	+ Fixed: Scroll between tabs.
	+ Fixed: Open/Close navigation menu.

	+ Fixed: Facebook Theme.

v0.1.0131
	+ Fixed: Card headers, Floating buttons.
	
v0.1.0130
	+ Added: New colors (grey, yellow, darkyellow, orange, red, pink, purple, darkpurple, lightblue, blue, darkblue, lightgren, green, darkgreen, brown).
	+ Added: New icons (button, cancel, cards, colors, location, navigation, text).
	+ Added: Open/Close navigation effect.
	+ Added: Gesture to launch open/close navigation effect.
	+ Fixed: Navigation, Card widths.
	+ Removed: Icons (close).
	
v0.1.0129
	+ Added: Colors (white, black, green).
	+ Added: Icons (add, close, comment, delete, done, download, edit, favorite, gallery, help, home, info, like, menu, next, options-h, options-v, prev, refresh, remove, search, send, settings, share, sync, upload).
	+ Added: Buttons (Icon buttons, Text buttons, Comb. buttons, Floating buttons.)
	+ Added: Normal cards, Cards with header images, Cards with images at left, Cards with images at right, Cards with grid of images.
